definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning

sentences.english: He had made up his mind that Johnson was guilty, and he steamrollered anyone who disagree with him.
sentences.chinese: 他已經認定約翰遜有罪，並迫使任何持異議者就範。

sentences.english: Well we've got the tools to teach you just how to wrangle your databases into submission.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我們得教你的工具是多麼纏鬥就範數據庫。

sentences.english: They tried to starve me out by a sex-trap.
sentences.chinese: 他們妄圖以女色迫我就範。

sentences.english: The Sukarno regime will not easily submit itself to the pressure from the USA.
sentences.chinese: 印尼蘇加諾政權對於來自美國的壓力也不會輕易就範。

sentences.english: The defeated general showed his submission by giving up his sword.
sentences.chinese: 這位敗將交出他的佩劍以示就範。
